name: Employee Record Management System /resetpassword.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Employee Record Management System Employee Record Management System 1.3"]
description: Employee Record Management System是一个员工记录管理系统。Employee Record Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/resetpassword.php中参数newpassword缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
